answers.answer: You need to see an ophthalmologist or optometrist for an eye examination.If you live in USA you can find an Eye MD near you at www.geteyesmart.orgJCH MD

I have the same thing. I take antidepressant medication, do you. This just started happening to me within the past 2 weeks. I thought I might be going blind, thought it might be a Side effect of my meds, thought it was diabetes, now I think it's low blood pressure. If you find anything out, please update this.

question: sometimes when I nap during the day I wake up and see bright, bright green for 2 seconds - then it goes awayThis discussion is related to/posts/Eye-Care-Archive/Seeing-Green/show/372083.
title: Wake Up and See Green
